required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Hydrocodone Bitartrate (HYD) Extended-Release Tablets on QT /QTc Intervals in Healthy Adult Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo- and Positive-Controlled, Parallel Group, Dose Escalating Study of the Effect of Hydrocodone Bitartrate (HYD) Extended-Release Tablets at Doses up to 160 mg on QT/QTc in Healthy Adult Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluate the effect of multiple doses (once daily for 3 days each of HYD 80, 120, and 160 mg tablets) on the QT/QTc interval.

primary_outcome.measure: The time-matched analysis on QT data (change from baseline, placebo-subtracted) corrected for heart rate (QTc), based on an individual correction (QTcI) method
primary_outcome.description: The electrocardiogram (ECG) effects of HYD 80 mg (day 9) on the QT/QTc interval

primary_outcome.measure: The time-matched analysis on QT data (change from baseline, placebo-subtracted) corrected for heart rate (QTc), based on an individual correction (QTcI) method
primary_outcome.description: The ECG effects of HYD 120 mg (day 12) on the QT/QTc interval

primary_outcome.measure: The time-matched analysis on QT data (change from baseline, placebo-subtracted) corrected for heart rate (QTc), based on an individual correction (QTcI) method
primary_outcome.description: The ECG effects of HYD 160 mg (day 15) on the QT/QTc interval

secondary_outcome.measure: The time-matched analysis on QT data (change from baseline, placebo-subtracted) corrected for heart rate (QTc), based on an individual correction (QTcI) method
secondary_outcome.description: The ECG effects of moxifloxacin (day 9) on the QT/QTc interval

secondary_outcome.measure: The time-matched analysis on QT data (change from baseline, placebo-subtracted) corrected for heart rate (QTc), based on an individual correction (QTcI) method
secondary_outcome.description: The ECG effects of moxifloxacin (day 12) on the QT/QTc interval

secondary_outcome.measure: The time-matched analysis on QT data (change from baseline, placebo-subtracted) corrected for heart rate (QTc), based on an individual correction (QTcI) method
secondary_outcome.description: The ECG effects of moxifloxacin (day 15) on the QT/QTc interval

arm_group.description: Placebo for HYD and placebo for moxifloxacin

intervention.description: Hydrocodone bitartrate 80 mg (day 9), 120 mg (day 12), 160 mg [(1) 40 mg tablet + (1) 120 mg tablet] (day 15) extended-release tablets administered orally every 24 hours.
Moxifloxacin 400 mg tablets administered orally on the morning of day 9, day 12, and day 15 only.
Placebo to match HYD tablets administered orally every 24 hours.
Placebo to match moxifloxacin tablets administered orally on the mornings of day 9, day 12, and day 15 only.
